theLastLightMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theLastLightMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theLastLightMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theLastLightMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theLastLightMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theLastLightMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theLastLightMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theLastLightMod:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
theLastLightMod:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theLastLightMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theLastLightMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theLastLightMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theLastLightMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theLastLightMod:PoisonStrike.NAME: Poison Strike
theLastLightMod:PoisonStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and !theLastLightMod:SecondMagic! Poison to an enemy.

theLastLightMod:WitheringStrike.NAME: Withering Strike
theLastLightMod:WitheringStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak and !theLastLightMod:SecondMagic! Wither to an enemy.

theLastLightMod:WitheringGlare.NAME: Withering Glare
theLastLightMod:WitheringGlare.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and then !theLastLightMod:SecondMagic! Wither to an enemy.
